title: Mccaine
author: Mccaine
content: Acquisition of Encrypgen ($DNA) by IndygeneUS AI: A Milestone in the World of DNA DataThe acquisition of Encrypgen, a DNA data marketplace, by IndygeneUS AI has created a buzz in the field of biotechnology and genetic research. Encrypgen is a leading platform that provides a secure, transparent and decentralized marketplace for the buying and selling of DNA data. With its cutting-edge technology, Encrypgen has revolutionized the way researchers and scientists access and use DNA data.IndygeneUS AI, on the other hand, is a well-known AI company that specializes in developing innovative solutions for the life sciences industry. Their expertise in AI, combined with Encrypgen's groundbreaking work in the DNA data marketplace, will bring new and exciting advancements in the field of genetic research.The acquisition of Encrypgen by IndygeneUS AI will result in a number of benefits for the industry, including:Increased Access to DNA Data: Encrypgen's DNA data marketplace provides a secure and transparent platform for the buying and selling of DNA data. With IndygeneUS AI's expertise in AI, the platform will be further developed to provide researchers and scientists with even greater access to DNA data.Advanced Technology: IndygeneUS AI's cutting-edge AI technology will be integrated into Encrypgen's platform, resulting in new and exciting advancements in the field of genetic research. This will allow researchers to make new discoveries and unlock the full potential of DNA data.Enhanced Security: Encrypgen is known for its commitment to providing a secure and transparent platform for DNA data. With IndygeneUS AI's expertise in security, the platform will become even more secure, providing users with greater peace of mind when buying and selling DNA data.Increased Privacy: DNA data is sensitive information that needs to be protected. Encrypgen's decentralized marketplace ensures that the privacy of DNA data is maintained. With IndygeneUS AI's expertise in privacy, the platform will be further developed to ensure that the privacy of users is maintained to the highest standard.The acquisition of Encrypgen by IndygeneUS AI is a major milestone in the world of DNA data. With its cutting-edge technology, enhanced security and increased privacy, the platform will provide researchers and scientists with the tools they need to unlock the full potential of DNA data. This will result in new and exciting advancements in the field of genetic research, providing benefits for both the industry and society as a whole.In conclusion, the acquisition of Encrypgen by IndygeneUS AI marks a new era in the world of DNA data. With its combination of expertise in AI, security, and privacy, the platform will provide researchers and scientists with the tools they need to unlock the full potential of DNA data. This is an exciting time for the field of genetic research and we look forward to seeing the new and exciting advancements that will result from this acquisition.$DNA token, the cryptocurrency used in the Encrypgen DNA data marketplace, is available for trading on Coinmetro, a cryptocurrency exchange.

comments.author: Mccaine
comments.body: Encrypgen is a blockchain company that operates a DNA data marketplace. It uses the DNA token as its means of exchange. The company has recently been acquired by IndyGeneUS AI, which is a black-owned and service disabled veteran-owned small business. IndyGeneUS AI leverages data mining and artificial intelligence to speed up the development of targeted therapies and bring them to market more quickly.

comments.author: NFTmetria
comments.body: If the technology is so cool why is the marketing so weak?

comments.author: Mccaine
comments.created_time: February 09, 2023, 04:44:25 PMLast edit: February 10, 2023, 08:19:17 AM by Mccaine
comments.body: I bet you haven't checked indygeneus.ai website?The marketing for the actual platform has not begun yet since they're still gathering data before it's of any use for researchers to purchase. (They need big chuncks) to do their studies!https://biotechnology.report/featured-news/indygeneus-ai-secures-pathogen-sequencing-for-covid-19-genomic-surveillance-initiativeshttps://nyufuturelabs.medium.com/the-many-hats-of-yusuf-henriques-serial-social-impact-entrepreneur-us-army-veteran-1ae968468522https://www.genomeweb.com/business-news/indygeneus-ai-secures-15m-seed-investment-south-african-isimovest-vc-partners#.Y-UiZ3bMK70https://tntribune.com/october-4-2021-marks-70th-anniversary-of-mrs-henrietta-lacks-death/https://www.forbes.com/sites/stewartsouthey/2021/04/27/the-great-wall-street-genome-gold-rush/?sh=5e9f3b3a717aLet me know if you're interested and i'll find more news and updates for you!

comments.author: Linc
comments.body: Nice to see Encrypgen/IndyGeneUS on here, been following them for a while now, they seem completely under the radar.They are a first mover but have always stuck to the science/business part of things instead of doing (crypto) marketing, which has only seem to have increased (or decreased if you will) since IndyGeneUS acquired them.Which makes sense, since they don't benefit from either a high nor a low token evaluation and have acquired several thousand datasets they still need to sequence.Most promising, except for the huge WGS dataset Indy is reported to be indexing, is that contrary to some of their competitors (which do invest heavily in the marketing aspect) is that they are sequence agnostic, so everyone is able to upload and sell their data regardless of which company did the sequencing.Expect this one to blow up hard if/when they ever finish the GeneChain v2.
